sound

Class AbstractSoundFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • sound.AbstractSoundFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SoundFilter

    public abstract class AbstractSoundFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements SoundFilter
    Gives a default implementation of the SoundFilter interface. This class should be subclassed instead of implementing the interface, but the interface can be safely implemented if neccessary.
    Author:
    stefanboodt
    See Also:
    Sound, SoundFilter, SoundManager

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        public void filter(byte[] samples)
        Description copied from interface: SoundFilter
        Filters the samples. The samples should be 16 bit, signed, little-endian format.
        Specified by:
        filter in interface SoundFilter
        Parameters:
        samples - The array to filter.
